articles.title: Louis C.K. Premieres Indie Drama ‘Fourth of July’ In New York - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: In early June, controversial comedian Louis C.K. dropped a surprise announcement that he was releasing a new feature project, Fourth of July, an indie dramedy which he directed, co-wrote, edited and stars in. On Thursday, Fourth of July had its world premiere…
